events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I paid for.
The customer's message indicates they want to return a wrong item, so the case is categorized under Refund.
The case has been assigned to refund specialist agent Sarah to handle and communicate with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect product you received.
Could you please provide your order number and send a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process the refund?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached are photos showing the incorrect item I got instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide you with a prepaid shipping label to return the incorrect product.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. Please send me the shipping label when it's ready.
We have emailed you the prepaid shipping label and confirmed the refund has been processed. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there is anything else we can help you with regarding your recent order.
Since everything has been resolved and your refund was confirmed, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our service. Thanks in advance for participating!
